Summary: Bright flaming hovering object above treeline in southeast Portland.
divs: Sighting DetailsObject was hovering above the treeline on between faster rd and 136th and 140th. duration 4 minutes, seen from Foster road, walking home. stopped and observed object slowly move left for approx. 30 seconds and hover approx1min, then move rightright, and lost sight of it to treeline. continued walking home. Object looking like a great white yellow ball of fire, very bright. Reference points: treeline, and two planes that passed behind the object from very far away. Very cold fear washed over me when observing object. Object was completely silent.
trends: There have been 158 other sightings in Portland
There was one other sighting in Portland on or around July 21st 2009
